hadiths.text: Narrated Buraydah ibn al-Hasib: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: Do not call a hypocrite sayyid (master), for if he is a sayyid, you will displease your Lord, Most High

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ يَقُولُ الْمَمْلُوكُ " رَبِّي وَرَبَّتِي "
chapter.eng-name: The slave should not say Rabbi or Rabbati (My lord, My lady)
